source_sentence: 佛說大乘智印經卷第四(第五同卷)西天三藏寶法大師賜紫沙門智吉祥等奉　詔譯爾時會中有頻婆娑王，
translation: Foshuo dayan zhiyin jing, vol. 4 (卷第四(第五同卷)西天三藏寶法大師賜紫沙門智吉祥等奉奉令譯爾時會中有頻婆娑王,

source_sentence: 其王夫人名賢吉祥，亦名酤胝金光——阿闍世王是彼所生——從座而起，
translation: The king’s consort was named Xiangxiang (“auspicious”) and also known as Ziqiao Jinguang (“upper radiance”). King Ajātaśatru, born of that queen, rose from his seat.

source_sentence: 五體投地，禮如來足。
translation: He prostrated himself at the feet of the Tathāgata with his five bodies on the ground.

source_sentence: 如是禮已，雙膝踞地，長跪合掌，色相怡悅，以妙音聲讚歎佛德。
translation: Having paid homage in this way, he knelt with both knees on the ground and joined his palms together. His complexion was graceful and pleasing, and he praised the Buddha’s virtue in a sublime voice.

source_sentence: 復以百千無價眾寶、微妙衣服奉上世尊以為供養。
translation: They also offered a hundred thousand priceless treasures and exquisite clothing to the Bhagavān as an offering.

source_sentence: 復以五百七寶之華散虛空中，成華雲蓋，遍覆眾會。
translation: Again, the five hundred and seven kinds of jeweled flowers scattered in the sky made canopies of clouds of flowers that covered all the assemblies.

source_sentence: 時賢吉祥作是種種諸供養已，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After making these kinds of offerings, Bhadraśri then said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我念未來濁惡世中，諸有情類信根薄劣，煩惱增多。
translation: I'll be mindful that in the future turbid and bad world, sentient beings with weak faith will have few roots of faith and more afflictions.

source_sentence: 我願於彼信解、受持此三摩地最勝法門。
translation: I want them to believe in and uphold the most excellent dharma-gate of this samādhi.

source_sentence: 若見有人書寫、受持、聽聞、讀誦、為人演說、開示導化，展轉流通，
translation: Suppose you see someone who writes, retains, hears, recites, explains, teaches, and transforms [the teaching] for others, and spreads it.

source_sentence: 使不斷絕，普令見聞而生信解，精進修習。
translation: They never cease, causing all to see and hear and give rise to faith and understanding; they diligently cultivate it.

source_sentence: 如是之人名為法器，我當於彼受持之者，歡喜讚歎，親近承事，供給所須飲食、衣服、臥具、醫藥，
translation: Such a person is called a vessel of the Dharma. I should receive and preserve it from him, to be joyful and praiseworthy, being intimate with and serving him, providing whatever he needs for food, drink, clothing, bedding, and medicine

source_sentence: 諸供養具令無歉乏。
translation: The offerings are made so that there's no lack of regret.

source_sentence: 復以大乘甚深之法更令悟入，令彼所住大乘種性，速得成熟於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提法；
translation: Again, by means of the profound teachings of the Great Vehicle they are further led to understand and enter. They cause those who abide in the seed-nature of the Great Vehicle to quickly mature into the principles of unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment

source_sentence: 不妄分別是空、不空，了知諸法離言執故；
translation: They do not falsely discriminate emptiness or nonempty, because they know all things are apart from verbal attachment.

source_sentence: 隨悟隨學，不生戲論。
translation: He follows enlightenment and training, not producing conceptual elaborations.

source_sentence: 為護正法，於諸身命無所悋惜，況復世間資生之物、增益煩惱、生死之具！
translation: In order to protect the right teaching, they don't cherish their bodies and lives, much less the worldly necessities, the growth of afflictions, or the necessities of birth-and-death!

source_sentence: 唯當修學如是殊勝三摩地法！」
translation: You should only cultivate such a superior samādhi!

source_sentence: 作是語已，退坐一面。
translation: After he said this, he withdrew and sat to one side.

source_sentence: 時頻婆娑王後宮八千婇女，聞如是說，各各發起阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，
translation: When the eight thousand court ladies in the palace of King Bimbisāra heard these words, they each conceived the spirit of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 而皆願樂無上大乘，欲學安住如是殊勝三摩地門，各從座起，合掌恭敬，
translation: They all wished to take delight in the supreme Great Vehicle and, wanting to learn and abide in such an excellent approach of concentration, each rose from his seat, joined his palms, and venerated him.

source_sentence: 頭面作禮，而白佛言：「世尊！
translation: He bowed his head and face and said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等咸當於後未來末世之中，受持如是甚深、圓滿、微妙之法，及願守護、供養受持之者！」
translation: We will all receive and uphold such a profound, perfect, subtle teaching in the latter part of the future, and we vow to guard and make offerings to those who accept and uphold it!

source_sentence: 時摩竭國烏波索迦、烏波斯迦六十萬眾，見是事已，咸皆歡喜，亦各發起阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，
translation: On seeing this sight, sixty million people in the kingdoms of Upāsaka and Upāsikā in Magadha all rejoiced and conceived the spirit of unexcelled, perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 於此智印三摩地法深心隨喜，作是願言：「我等亦願於後未來濁惡世中，
translation: Being deeply delighted with these teachings of the wisdom-seal samādhi, they made this vow, saying:

source_sentence: 於是妙法圓滿護持！」
translation: Thus, the marvelous Dharma is perfected and guarded!

source_sentence: 爾時世尊知彼摩竭陀國烏波索迦、烏波斯迦，并賢吉祥酤胝金光夫人，
translation: It was then that the World-honored One knew of Upāsaka and Upāsikā of Magadha as well as Lady Sanghavyūha, who had a golden light shining like this.

source_sentence: 與後宮婇女八千人等，心口所願，信解受持如是妙法，長時修習無間、無斷，
translation: He and the eight thousand women of the latter palace, believing in what they wished, believed, understood, accepted, and upheld such a wonderful teaching, cultivating it for a long time without interruption or interruption.

source_sentence: 知諸佛果從此法生，示現歡喜，忻然微笑。
translation: Knowing that the fruits of buddhahood arise from these teachings, they show joy and smile with delight.

source_sentence: 緣是笑故，有百千種微妙色光從佛口出，所謂青、黃、赤、白及頗胝迦，
translation: Because of this smile, a hundred thousand kinds of subtle colors and lights emerged from the Buddha’s mouth: blue, yellow, red, white, and crystal.

source_sentence: 種種色相普遍世界。
translation: Various forms and characteristics pervade the world.

source_sentence: 其中眾生覩此光明離諸驚怖，摧伏一切煩惱魔怨。
translation: The sentient beings there see this light and are freed from their fears, subduing all the afflictions, Māra, and enemies.

source_sentence: 其光上照至有頂天，日、月光明所不照處悉皆通徹，下至一切諸大地獄及諸惡趣，
translation: That light shone upward to the top of the celestial scale, reaching as far as all the great hells and evil destinies.

source_sentence: 苦惱休息，穢惡悉除，皆得清淨。
translation: When pain and suffering cease, defilement and evil are completely removed, and they all attain purity.

source_sentence: 其光迴旋還至佛所，右繞千匝，覆世尊頂，隱而不現。
translation: The light returned to the Buddha one thousand paces to his right and covered the World-honored One’s crown, but remained hidden.

source_sentence: 爾時賢吉祥酤胝金光夫人見是光已，不知如來放光義利，復從座起，整肅衣容，
translation: At that time the good and auspicious goddess Vairocana, seeing this ray of light, did not know the significance of the Tathāgata’s lighting. Then she rose again from her seat and arrayed herself in a dignified manner

source_sentence: 「佛德差別無邊際，　　三界最勝無與等，
translation: The virtues of buddhas have no bounds, and the supreme qualities of all beings in the three realms are peerless.

source_sentence: 如華開敷正芬芳，　　似月印空已圓滿。
translation: Like flowers blooming with a correct fragrance, it's like the moon seal of emptiness having been completed.

source_sentence: 佛心平等離憂喜，　　云何今者現微笑？
translation: The Buddha's mind is equal and free of sorrow and joy, so why does he now show a smile?

source_sentence: 我今仰測笑因緣，　　應當演說微妙法。
translation: Now, I'll look up and fathom the causes and conditions for laughing, and I'll explain the subtle teaching.

source_sentence: 具足安樂十力尊，　　處眾猶如星中月，
translation: Venerable One who is endowed with the ten powers of well-being, Abiding among all beings like the moon in the sky.

source_sentence: 所說言辭義味豐，　　為諸世界眾生眼。
translation: The words he teaches are rich in meaning and flavor, For the eyes of sentient beings in all worlds.

source_sentence: 法如一雨無差別，　　隨諸根性令生解，
translation: The Teaching is like a single rain, without distinction, Causing understanding to arise according to the faculties and natures.

source_sentence: 梵音清徹福無邊，　　凡在聽聞皆歡喜。
translation: The sound of Brahma is pure and penetrating, boundless in virtue; All who hear it are joyful.

source_sentence: 由是聞法勝因緣，　　得未曾有諸快樂，
translation: Because of this superior cause and condition of hearing the Dharma, they attain unprecedented happiness.

source_sentence: 願佛為作師子吼，　　蠲除種種諸報業。
translation: May the Buddha make a lion’s roar for them, getting rid of all kinds of karmic retribution.

source_sentence: 眾生聞法皆悅可，　　隨喜平等諸義味，
translation: Sentient beings who hear the Teaching are all delighted, tasting meaningful flavors equally according to their joy.

source_sentence: 自他見聞及受持，　　應根應時能解了。
translation: The seeing, hearing, and retaining of self and others are the faculties that can understand them at the appropriate time.

source_sentence: 由茲開發菩提心，　　悉於所聞生尊重，
translation: Because of this they develop the aspiration for enlightenment, All honoring what they hear.

source_sentence: 八種圓滿無漏音，　　普應無邊諸性欲。
translation: Eight kinds of perfect, pure sounds Are universally adapted to boundless natures and desires.

source_sentence: 一切說法功德中，　　相應諸數無違背，
translation: Among all the virtues of teaching the Dharma, Their numbers are not contradictory.

source_sentence: 令諸受化諸有情，　　悟入聞持心堅固。
translation: Causing sentient beings to receive instruction, they awaken into and hear it, retaining their minds firmly.

source_sentence: 不為煩惱嬈其心，　　使於所得無退轉，
translation: Their minds aren’t disturbed by afflictions, So that they don’t regress in attaining enlightenment.

source_sentence: 受持禁戒眾律儀，　　縱遇違緣悉能忍。
translation: Accepting and upholding the precepts and various restraints, they're able to tolerate any disobedient conditions even when encountered.

source_sentence: 遠離塵勞無眾苦，　　身心安住寂滅樂，
translation: Being far removed from worldly troubles and suffering, free of all afflictions, Abiding peacefully in body and mind in the bliss of extinction,

source_sentence: 於此菩提勝行中，　　思惟修作常精進。
translation: In this supreme practice of enlightenment, they contemplate and cultivate constant effort.

source_sentence: 佛身猶如妙金山，　　亦如寶塔光明聚，
translation: The body of the Buddha is like a mountain of beautiful gold, Like a cluster of lights in a jeweled tower.

source_sentence: 蓮華出水正開敷，　　凡是見聞悉瞻仰。
translation: The lotus flower emerges from the water and is just blooming, Whoever sees or hears it will look up to it.

source_sentence: 如師子王遊戲時，　　吼大音聲伏眾獸，
translation: It’s like when the lion king is playing, Roaring in a loud voice to subdue all animals.

source_sentence: 惟願演是笑因緣，　　令我眾會除疑惑。
translation: May I explain these reasons for this laughter, so that my assembly will be freed from doubt and confusion.

source_sentence: 佛於諸法得自在，　　契合無相真實理，
translation: The Buddha, having attained mastery over all things, Is united with the truth of signlessness.

source_sentence: 令差別性諸有情，　　各各三業淨無垢。
translation: Causing sentient beings with distinctive characteristics, each of the three actions is pure and undefiled.

source_sentence: 不捨眾生常護持，　　令轉善因獲勝果，
translation: Not abandoning sentient beings, they always protect them, Causing them to develop good causes and attain superior results.

source_sentence: 十方世界諸眾生，　　聞已思惟正修作。
translation: The sentient beings of the worlds in the ten directions, Having heard it, Think and correctly cultivate it.

source_sentence: 摧伏一切煩惱熱，　　如飲甘露心清涼，
translation: He subdues the fever of all afflictions, Like drinking ambrosia that cools the mind.

source_sentence: 如來所有說法聲，　　世間眾音莫能比。
translation: The voice of the Buddha’s discourse cannot be compared to any in the world.

source_sentence: 琵琶笙笛及角貝，　　箜篌鼓瑟妙歌唱，
translation: They played the lusters, the flutes, the horns, and the shellfish. The drums sounded sweet and they sang beautifully.

source_sentence: 桴擊犍椎及鐃鈸，　　如是諸樂共振作，
translation: To beat the gandharva and the gong, such music is performed together with joy.

source_sentence: 命命頻伽及鸚鵡，　　如是眾鳥皆和鳴，
translation: All the birds that live, such as vipers and parrots, Are singing harmoniously.

source_sentence: 佛發微妙柔軟音，　　眾音相共莫能比。
translation: The Buddha produces subtle and gentle sounds That cannot be compared to the many sounds in common.

source_sentence: 此十方眾來集會，　　毀持好惡心差別，
translation: These beings of the ten directions come and assemble, disparaging distinctions in good and evil thoughts.

source_sentence: 惟願方便隨宜說，　　調伏彼中[怡-台+龍]悷者，
translation: May you skillfully explain it as appropriate, taming those in the midst of lust and hatred.

source_sentence: 咸使悛革不善心，　　普圓無邊勝善願。
translation: They all cause unwholesome minds to change, Universally perfecting boundless supreme good vows.

source_sentence: 彼從酤胝剎土來，　　為聞世尊說法故，
translation: They came from the land of Vaiśravaṇa In order to hear the Buddha’s discourse.

source_sentence: 願今領悟正法音，　　離諸怖畏獲安樂。
translation: May they now hear the voice of the true teaching, Be freed from fear and attain peace.

source_sentence: 惟願世尊雨法雨，　　慈悲演說無上法，
translation: May the World-honored One rain down the rain of truth And, out of compassion, he teaches the unexcelled Dharma.

source_sentence: 冀能圓滿無漏音，　　究竟得成菩提果。」
translation: He hopes to perfect the uncontaminated sound and ultimately attain the fruit of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 恭敬合掌，雙膝長跪，頂禮世尊，精勤三業，讚歎佛德，而說偈言：爾時世尊聞是賢吉祥酤胝金光夫人說是偈已，
translation: He joined his palms in respect, knelt with both knees joined, and venerated the World-honored One by bowing his forehead to the Buddha’s feet. After exerting himself in these three kinds of deeds,

source_sentence: 「我於無量世，　　殑伽沙劫中，
translation: “For immeasurable ages, For as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River,

source_sentence: 時有大法王，　　名無相福光。
translation: At that time there was a great king of the Dharma, Called signless Light of Virtue.

source_sentence: 佛壽極長遠，　　七十六酤胝，
translation: The Buddha’s life span will be extremely long, Seventy-six years in length.

source_sentence: 化諸四天下；　　彼土聲聞眾，
translation: He taught in the four continents of the earth, teaching the disciples there.

source_sentence: 其數無有量；　　以智印法門，
translation: Their number was immeasurable, and by means of the Teaching of the Seal of Knowledge they were able to teach the Dharma.

source_sentence: 引導眾生類。　　時有轉輪王，
translation: At that time there was a universal ruler who guided all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 號名曰勝慧，　　王有二夫人，
translation: His name was Shenghui and the king had two wives.

source_sentence: 一名曰帝幢，　　其次號日光。
translation: The first is called Indra’s Banner, followed by the name Sunlight.

source_sentence: 聞是智印門，　　晝夜常精進，
translation: Hearing this is the door of the seal of wisdom, he always makes effort day and night.

source_sentence: 勤修諸善業，　　於一酤胝年；
translation: They diligently cultivate good deeds For one wholesome year.

source_sentence: 護持正法眼，　　經六十酤胝；
translation: He guarded the eye of the true teaching for sixty eons.

source_sentence: 為師導眾類，　　已於三十億。
translation: Their teachers and guides of all kinds Have already passed away in thirty koṭis.

source_sentence: 無量諸佛所，　　積集諸功德，
translation: Innumerable buddhas have accumulated virtues.

source_sentence: 無量世界中，　　法眼常救護。
translation: In boundless worlds The eye of truth always protects them.

source_sentence: 三十殑伽沙，　　未來世諸佛，
translation: Thirty sands of the Ganges River, The buddhas of the future.

source_sentence: 於彼彼世間，　　平等普護持，
translation: In each and every world They preserve it impartially.

source_sentence: 如是正法眼，　　皆令不斷絕。
translation: Such is the eye of the true teaching, which causes all to never cease.

source_sentence: 時彼勝慧王，　　今阿閦佛是。
translation: At the time, that king of superior wisdom was Akṣobhya Buddha.

source_sentence: 彼會清淨眾，　　夫人與眷屬，
translation: The pure members of the assembly, their wives and retinues,

source_sentence: 各各同俱生，　　如是佛國土。
translation: Each one is born together with the same: Such is the Buddha’s land.

source_sentence: 護法心不怠，　　復於後後時，
translation: He protects the mind of the Dharma and doesn't lazy, and furthermore, at some point later,

source_sentence: 轉彼女人身，　　得成於男子，
translation: He transforms the woman's body into a man and becomes a woman.

source_sentence: 即生於無量，　　安樂佛世界。
translation: That is, they'll be born in an immeasurable and peaceful Buddha world.

source_sentence: 如今末世中，　　唯汝賢吉祥，
translation: In the age to come, Only you, good and auspicious one, Will be the only one who will become a buddha.

source_sentence: 能護如來法，　　任持不破壞。
translation: They can protect the teachings of the enlightened, Upholding and not destroying them.

source_sentence: 應以菩提心，　　普遍諸佛剎，
translation: You should use the mind of enlightenment To pervade all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 正法欲盡時，　　一切皆救護。
translation: When the true teaching is about to end, they all rescue and protect it.

source_sentence: 使彼覺法人，　　同生安樂國，
translation: So that those enlightened ones will all be born together in the land of peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 坐千葉蓮華，　　得諸佛相好，
translation: Sitting on a thousand-petaled lotus, they'll attain the characteristics of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 莊嚴皆具足。　　既生彼土已，
translation: They are all endowed with the adornments and have been born in that land.

source_sentence: 復供養諸佛，　　末後當次第，
translation: Further offerings to the buddhas will follow one another in order.

source_sentence: 於彼莊嚴劫，　　得成無上道。
translation: In that world age of adornment They will attain the highest path.

source_sentence: 以阿耨菩提，　　轉授諸人天，
translation: Because of the supreme enlightenment, He bestows it on humans and gods.

source_sentence: 令發無上心，　　同守護正法。
translation: Causing them to give rise to the unsurpassed mind, they all guard the right teaching together.

source_sentence: 彼土離魔怨，　　及以三毒業，
translation: In that land, they're free of Māra's enemies and the three poisonous actions.

source_sentence: 不生諸罪戾，　　諸惡悉無有。
translation: They don't give rise to sins and disobedience, and there are no bad things at all.

source_sentence: 不處於胎臟，　　清淨而化生，
translation: They do not dwell in the womb, Yet are born pure and phantomlike.

source_sentence: 與無數菩薩，　　皆集於此會。
translation: Together with countless bodhisattvas, They assembled at this assembly.

source_sentence: 無有諸聲聞，　　亦不聞名字，
translation: There are no śrāvakas, Nor do they hear their names.

source_sentence: 遠離諸惡緣，　　常修菩提行。
translation: Being far removed from bad conditions, they always cultivate the practice of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 捨名聞利養，　　不戀著親昵，
translation: They give up fame and profit, And don’t cling to intimacy.

source_sentence: 捐棄身命財，　　饒益有情類。
translation: Giving up one’s body, life, and property for the benefit of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 方便為說法，　　普令生信解，
translation: Teaching the Dharma with skillful means, Causing all to give rise to faith and understanding.

source_sentence: 若有能修習，　　佛無上菩提。
translation: If someone can cultivate it, they'll attain the Buddha's unsurpassed enlightenment.

source_sentence: 安住此法中，　　不求世間樂，
translation: Abiding in this teaching, they don’t seek worldly pleasures.

source_sentence: 如說而修行，　　普遍諸佛土，
translation: Practice them as they are taught, Pervading all buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 常生恭敬心，　　護持諸佛法。
translation: They always give rise to respectful thoughts And preserve the buddha-teachings.

source_sentence: 有懷嫉妬者，　　應當密護持，
translation: Someone who harbors jealousy Should be guarded in secret.

source_sentence: 以大憐憫心，　　教誡諸有情，
translation: With great compassion, they admonish sentient beings.

source_sentence: 令如是修學，　　咸離諸苦厄。
translation: Causing them to thus cultivate it, they'll all be free of suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 如我往昔時，　　為求菩提故，
translation: Just as in the past I sought enlightenment,

source_sentence: 於酤胝劫中，　　捨頭目髓腦，
translation: In the eon of anguish, he'll abandon his head, eyes, marrow, and brains.

source_sentence: 珍寶及妻兒，　　一切無愛戀。
translation: Precious treasures and wives and children are all unattractive.

source_sentence: 若於我法中，　　不能生諦信，
translation: If you can’t give rise to faith in the truths about self and things,

source_sentence: 方便願力利樂有情；
translation: By the power of skillful means and vows they bring benefit to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 聞無量法，心無忘失；
translation: They hear boundless teachings without forgetfulness in their minds.

source_sentence: 修種種善，為利有情；
translation: They cultivate various goodnesses for the benefit of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 於世樂果不生希望；
translation: They do not give rise to hope of worldly happiness.

source_sentence: 令諸眾生速登彼岸。
translation: It causes sentient beings to quickly ascend to the other shore.

source_sentence: 「復次，彌勒！
translation: Furthermore, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 彼諸菩薩曾於往昔百世尊所發菩提心，真實平等，種種善根，植眾德本，
translation: Those enlightening beings had set their minds on enlightenment in the past under hundreds of world-honored ones. They were truly impartial, having planted various roots of goodness and planting all kinds of roots of virtue.

source_sentence: 離諸苦縛。
translation: He's free of the bond of suffering.

source_sentence: 由為末世諸惡眾生而來惱害，不能於此信解、修習，何況末世諸惡眾生，
translation: Because they came to harm evil sentient beings of later ages, they are unable to believe in them or practice them. How much less will evil sentient beings of later ages be able to do so.

source_sentence: 不種善根，迷惑散亂而能覺悟！
translation: They don't plant good roots, are confused and scattered, and can awaken!

source_sentence: 是故末世諸不善人，於此最勝甚深之法不能信受、如理修學。
translation: That's why unwholesome people in the latter part of the world can't believe in this most excellent and profound teaching and cultivate it accordingly.

source_sentence: 「復次，彌勒！
translation: Furthermore, Maitreya!

source_sentence: 若諸菩薩能於是法深生信解，志意堅固，被忍辱鎧，降伏諸魔，長時修行，
translation: “Furthermore, if enlightening beings can deeply believe in these teachings and have firm determination for them, they will be armed with the armor of tolerance to subdue all demons and practice over a long period of time.

source_sentence: 保護任持，不生退屈，廣大智慧、無量善法從此法生，一心希求無上菩提，
translation: They guard and maintain it freely, not shrinking back. Vast knowledge and immeasurable virtuous qualities arise from this teaching; they singlemindedly seek supreme enlightenment.

source_sentence: 念念相應，堅固不捨。
translation: Each thought is associated with the other, and it's resolute and not abandoned.

source_sentence: 復於未來敷演妙義，精進不倦，究竟護持是三摩地最上法門，了達一切善惡事業，
translation: “Furthermore, in the future he will expound sublime doctrines without weariness, exerting himself energetically and tirelessly. Ultimately preserving this supreme dharma-gate of concentration, he comprehends all good and evil

source_sentence: 安住法中勤修眾行。」
translation: Abiding in the Dharma, they diligently cultivate various practices.

source_sentence: 佛說大乘智印經卷第四
translation: Foshuo daishi zhiyin jing, vol. 4
